name: MirrorFall
description:
MirrorFall is a puzzle-RPG game, featuring battle mechanics where you match block colors to shatter your enemies, with pixel art aesthetics inspired by a blend of SNES, and GBA visuals.

                                                             

In MirrorFall, you play as the blockmaster, and skrunkly scientist Lucie Lilly, who enters an unknown universe through mirror dimensions in order to collect Mirror Shards - which are objects of phenomenal, and mysterious meaning.

 Oh, and there's her sister Suzan Lilly, but nobody cares about her...

                                                        

In the MirrorFall Demo, you will explore a universe known as The Gallery, which has been taken over by the chaotic and bizarre Gallery Cats, who are in ties with The King to defend The Mirror from being shattered.
